price: 10. ir sakiau: „Prašykite savo Viešpaties atleidimo. Tikrai, Jis yra Visa Atleidžiantis.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
